effect.name: Texture Wipe (Simple)
effect.description:
Create transitions for it on: https://eevee.itch.io/particle-wipe-generator
Because of a issue on Fusion, when applied to Layers it only works perfectly on DX11 Premultiplied mode.
It can only be used applied to a Layer or Frame on Windows (at least up to build 295)
Notes: Full version available at NaitorStudios Patreon, Ko-Fi or itch.io
effect.author: NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Transition Mask
parameter.description: The Image to use the "Bar" effect with. Check the effect decription for a tool to create these.

parameter.name: Progress
parameter.description: Progress of the transition in float.

parameter.name: Use Alpha
parameter.description: ON: Wipe the alpha channel. OFF: Wipe to color specified bellow.
